content: The drugs took hold in Larry, a man who had rarely even finished a beer before. As he began to take more and more, life took a turn none of us saw coming: our younger brother Myke found his way out of decades of heroin and jail. For a brief moment, Myke’s rise and Larry’s decline crossed as they invested together in a tattoo parlor Myke started. Myke went on to greater and greater success, and Larry just sunk deeper.
